title: El Turco
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An upscale Turkish buffet restaurant with either pay by weight or all you can eat for a fixed price. The entire large cold section is vegetarian and vegan. Only offers just a few meat dishes in the warm buffet and everything else is vegetarian and vegan.
